page.title: 02Star Manor Militaires 2
page.content:
The Militaires imitate soldiers marching to a military band. They have to practise every day of the week. The majorettes march in complicated patterns twirling batons and flags.The band play drums and bugles.
They travel in two coaches, one for the majorettes and the other for their parents. It sometimes seems the whole area is involved.
Children joined the Manor Militaires because they liked the idea of beating drums or girls joined to twirl batons and flags. Others had seen majorettes and marching bands on television and thought it would be exciting.
